The town adventurer. A discourse of masquerades, playes, &c. By Don Francisco de Quevedo, Junior. Quevedo, Francisco de, 1580-1645. aut
[4], 170 p.
printed for G. Baile, and are to be sold by H. Eversden, at the Crown in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange, and at the ... the Strand, London : 167[5]
Publication date from Wing. Errata on the verso of the title page. Formerly Wing (2nd ed.) Q194. Imperfect; title page torn affecting imprint. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
